subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Hasheem Thabeet of Connecticut has decided to forgo his final year of college eligibility and enter the N.B.A. draft. Thabeet, a 7-foot-3 center from Tanzania, said he made the decision after speaking to family, friends and Coach Jim Calhoun. Thabeet, the Big East co-Player of the Year with Pittsburgh’s DeJuan Blair, averaged 13.6 points, 10.8 rebounds and 4.2 blocked shots per game in helping the Huskies to a 31-5 record and a Final Four berth.
